mapper.insert: insert into board values ( b_seq.nextval, #{b_title}, #{b_writer}, #{b_contents}, sysdate, #{b_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 'Y', #{b_parent_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{b_upd_contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b_upd_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, b.* FROM (SELECT b_seq,b_title,b_writer,b_contents,b_write_time,b_count,b_upd_time,b_status FROM board where b_status='Y' ORDER BY b_write_time desc) b) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{getPageStart} AND #{pageStartToPerPageNum}
select b_title, b_seq, b_write_time , b_count, b_upd_time, b_writer, b_contents from board where b_seq=#{b_seq}
mapper.update: update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_contents=#{b_contents}, b_upd_time=sysdate where b_seq=#{b_seq}
